Desc.entry: A car sharing club with cars and vans available to hire 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Vehicles can be booked by the hour, day or for as long as you want. Conveniently located in the designated parking bays across Sheffield the vehicles can be booked in advance or at a moments notice. Insurance, tax, servicing, parking permits and cleaning are all included. An annual membership fee applies.
